question_content.description:
### Problem03


 A singly linked list comprises a sequence of _____(0)\___, with each containing a reference (or link) to its successor. By convention, the link in the last node is _____(1)\___, to indicate that it terminates the list (literally from sec-4.3).

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Yantao Mei
